text: Hagi tutagi ha'ma huzmantaza vahe'mo'za zamahe frizage'za, ha' vahe zamimo'za amanage hu'naze. Anama zamahe frisaza zamofo kna'a tagra e'origahune. Na'ankure Agripima mani'nesageno fatgo avu'ava zama huno kegavama huzmantesia Ra Anumzamofo avufi kumira nehu'za, zamafahe'mo'za Agrite'ma muha'ma hu'naza Ra Anumzamofo avufi kumira hu'naze.
